meanings.definition: Time worked beyond regular working hours.
meanings.sent1: After finishing his shift, John stayed late to complete the project during overtime.
meanings.sent2: The employees were paid extra for working overtime on weekends.
meanings.sent3: During overtime, the office turned into a bustling hive of activity.
meanings.sent4: The concept of overtime can sometimes blur the line between work and personal time.
meanings.sent5: The overtime hours spent at the office added up to a significant amount on the paycheck.

meanings.definition: Additional time added to a sports game when the score is tied at the end of regulation time.
meanings.sent1: The basketball game went into overtime after both teams scored equally in the final minutes.
meanings.sent2: Fans cheered loudly as the soccer match entered overtime, hoping for a decisive goal.
meanings.sent3: The players were exhausted but determined to give their best performance during overtime.
meanings.sent4: The tension during overtime was palpable as the fate of the championship hung in the balance.
meanings.sent5: The excitement peaked as the hockey game entered overtime, promising a thrilling conclusion.
